DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine complete overall response rate paclitaxel patient previously untreated extensive stage small cell lung cancer . II . Determine overall progression free survival patient response treatment regimen . III . Determine toxicity treatment regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour weekly 6 consecutive week . Treatment continue every 8 week 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 2 month 1 year , every 3 month 2 year , annually 2 year .
